programme.title: Man's Greatest Food
programme.desc: From seafood and beef to pork and cheese, all the best foods taste better fried and Roger Mooking is scouring the country in search of the 12 best fried-food dishes. He's hanging out with fried-food-loving chefs learning all their secrets.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger Mooking tames the flames in outdoor kitchens fueled by wood-burning fires. In Solvang, Calif., the Alisal Guest Ranch and Resort is home to 10,000 acres of land with horses, cattle and a bevy of fiery cooking contraptions.

programme.title: Man Fire Food
programme.desc: Roger visits two Southern California barbeque joints that serve smoked meat specialties on weekends.

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: Man Fire Food

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: The brown bears keep tearing up their exhibit, leaving zoo staff scrambling for a solution. Armani the aardvark gets treated for a tooth infection which has dampened her enthusiasm for digging. And, a group of burrowing owls prepare to move.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia takes in several dogs from a dog fighting ring, and Cheech finally gets a chance at a forever home after years of being overlooked. Then, a Parolee uses his personal experiences to help troubled teens.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens patrol the southern border for illegal fishing activity and the northern border for a trapper who may be selling live coyotes. Game Wardens go undercover to stop someone suspected of harassing deer hunters.

programme.desc: Lucas is tasked with a challenging project: repair and remodel an unusable pool for a famous golfing family. Puzzled as to how this pool was even built, Lucas creates an ocean-themed pool with fire features, an infinity edge and his first water couch.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: After transforming more than 150 backyards into paradise, Lucas is revisiting five of his favourite builds and families. Lucas and his team reveal their never-before-seen, most outrageous backyard creations.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: A dedicated caregiver gets her lifelong wish of having her own pool. Lucas faces the pressure of not only building a dream pool, but has to create it in a small backyard. The team transforms the family's yard into a little oasis with big potential.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: The slow loris has a tiny window for breeding, so staff anxiously help a potential pair connect. The veterinary team develop ground-breaking techniques to treat the stoic pigeons and an okapi with a limp gets a helping hand.

programme.desc: Tia sends Mariah to California to rescue a former member of the VRC family. A puppy's behaviour puts her chances at a forever home at risk. After receiving a call about a pit bull, Tia jumps into action.

programme.desc: Officers Adam Cheney and Geoff Pushee run into an aggressive and angry hunter while investigating a road hunting complaint.

programme.desc: Officers Murphy and Demler investigate a suspicious turkey kill while Officer Courtney rescues a scared fawn near a busy intersection. Officer Lucas races to save a sick loon and Officer Fluette helps a hiker find his father who is lost in the woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Hannett is tested trying to capture an injured goose. Officer Lucas is the first responder on scene for a drug overdose. And Officer MacFadzen must climb 40 feet into the treetops to deal with an aggressive hawk.

programme.desc: Officer MacFadzen tracks a trapper suspected of poaching, and stealing a trail camera surveying the illegal traps. Officer Lucas investigates the death of an owl. And, officers question a father and son who may have hunted over illegal bait.

programme.desc: Palmeiras e Santos decidem o principal título da América do Sul no estádio do Maracanã. O único triunfo alviverde na competição foi em 1999, já o Peixe busca o tetracampeonato do torneio. A última conquista do Santos foi em 2011 com Neymar em campo.

programme.title: Betis x Osasuna
programme.desc: Pela 21ª rodada, o Betis recebe o Osasuna no estádio Benito Villamarín. O time da casa não perde há quatro partidas e tenta manter o embalo. O adversário busca a segunda vitória consecutiva para se afastar da zona de rebaixamento.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In West Covina, Rene brings Gunther along for moral support but gets annoyed when he won't take sides. Darrell stumbles over what may be a diamond in the rough. Brandi and Jarrod discover a different national pastime.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.desc: This time, Darrell might be at risk of losing the title of 'The King of Montebello.' Brandi and Jarrod find their way back to the auction with the help of some pocket tech. Casey bails himself out despite being confined with an infectious German.

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Vegas Ladies show up in "Bourgie Brea," and find the place fascinating. Mary decides to deal with her storage stress by introducing a bit of yoga into her routine. Ivy and Dave go head-to-head on a giant pair of sister lockers.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Victorville, Ivy takes it easy, letting Ivy Jr. run the operation. Kenny feels run down and his lack of focus lands him a locker, though there's a pleasant surprise in the end. Mary, Shana and Edwina just can’t seem to make anything stick.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: It's a momentous occasion in Van Nuys for Darrell, and he has a completely groovy time with it. Ivy starts his day off with an unwelcome bang. Brandi and Jarrod are left wondering whether their unit will bring clear skies or clouds ahead.

programme.desc: The Vegas Ladies arrive in vintage style, though not everyone agrees. Darrell tries to peddle his wares to Emily.

programme.desc: The most violent night in the history of Anchorage, Alaska leaves seven dead - including four teens. And, the small police department is virtually overwhelmed by the string of shootings until clues lead them to the unlikeliest of suspects.

programme.desc: When 18-year old Brittany Clardy starts dating an older man, her life veers from model student to lost soul. And when the teenager disappears, her family panics. Now, investigators must unravel her complicated life filled with secrets and regret.

programme.title: The Wonderland Murders
programme.desc: When Detective Molly Daul works two homicides back to back, she realizes she's dealing with a sexual predator who targets trusting young women. Arrested before he can kill again in Seattle, his chilling confession remains with Molly to this day.

programme.title: Dead Silent
programme.desc: In May 2000, friends Liz Reiser and Brandi Hicks go to a video store in the quaint Ohio town of New Philadelphia. Their plans for an innocent movie night morph into a true-life horror film when they give a ride to a stranger in the parking lot.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: When the home of the Resaca, Georgia 'Carpet King' is showered with gunfire and kills beloved daughter Tara Swilley, the self-made millionaire is convinced one of his business partners must be behind the killing.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A Philadelphia woman disappears in the fall of 1977. Later, police come to learn the terrifying truth about her whereabouts, but struggle to locate and bring in her killer.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Nicole White is in the middle of a bitter custody battle when she vanishes. Suspicion falls on an online date until her husband turns up unexpectedly with his face scratched.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl vanishes in 1981. Detectives believe she was murdered. Years later a woman appears and claims to be the missing girl.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Jealousy's a curse but it's never an excuse to kill.

programme.title: Web of Lies

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A Philadelphia woman disappears in the fall of 1977. Later, police come to learn the terrifying truth about her whereabouts, but struggle to locate and bring in her killer.

programme.title: Motives & Murders
programme.desc: A respected widow is beaten to death in her Salt Lake City home. Investigators suspect the victim knew her killer, but it will take 20 years before a set of children's fingerprints can put him at the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Motives & Murders
programme.desc: When 18-year-old Lisa Monza is murdered in San Lorenzo, California, investigators look for a connection to other unsolved murders in the area. But it will take several years and help from an unlikely source before they can track down her killer.

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: Narleen Campton was found viciously beaten to death in her own home after she didn't contact her daughter Sabrina on Thanksgiving. Who would want to murder the 62-year-old grandmother? The investigation unravels a murky world of drugs and violence.

programme.title: My Murder Story
programme.desc: A woman falls head over heels and marries a charming man, but she gets more than she bargained for. Confronted with the harsh reality, she undertakes her own investigation to find out who she really married.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: A new job in a new town seems like a promising start for expectant parents Kent and Malinda Gibbons. But life quickly turns into a nightmare when Kent finds Malinda raped and murdered at home. Detectives find themselves in a race to stop a killer.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: A sleepy New England beach town is the backdrop to murder, when a young mother-to-be is found tied up and strangled. It takes years but a chance encounter leads investigators down a long winding path of misleads and greed before they find the real killer.

programme.title: The 1990s: The Deadliest Decade
programme.desc: In rural Indiana, the badly burned body of a young woman is found in an open field. Soon, investigators discover a harrowing tale that leads back to witchcraft, a cast of troubled teens, and a surprising love triangle that was cursed from the start.

programme.title: A Crime to Remember
programme.desc: Honolulu, HA, 1931: When the young aristocratic wife of a Naval Lieutenant is discovered bruised and beaten by the side of a dark road, a hackneyed scheme and a trigger-happy hand will lead to the most sensational murder trial in Hawaii's history.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: 13 year-old Kacie Woody meets two male friends via the internet – Scott, from Atlanta; and Dave, a surfing enthusiast from California. But one of these boys is not what he seems, as Kacie's innocent online contacts turn to tragedy.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Susan Smith, a big dreamer stuck in a rural town, becomes an FBI informant to protect her kids from her jealous husband's criminal friends… but her desire to do the right thing brings hellish consequences.

programme.title: 'Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Frances and Bill Hall Jr. appear to be the perfect couple two kids, a successful business, and a 30-year marriage. But on October 13, 2013, an unexpected encounter leads to a fatality, and the investigation reveals a story of infidelity and obsession.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: A landscaper that has an obsession for his client won't take no for an answer.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Police struggle to find a vicious killer despite having DNA evidence and a videotape of the suspect.

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: Every week Janine Sutphen went to symphony practice. One night, she didn't come home. Her husband reveals to police there's more to this housewife than anyone knew. But very quickly a secret comes out- leading investigators down a dark, twisted path.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. When the witnesses are unable to provide any solid leads, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William's circle is lying.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: Melissa Atkin is found bound and murdered in her home in Smyrna, Tennessee. Eventually, the investigation focuses in on two individuals, with a series of recorded phone calls proving vital in exonerating one of them, whilst incriminating the other.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: In 2017, Federal Heights, Colorado is filled with fear when 69-year-old veteran Bill Mussack is reported missing gone without a trace. Police act fast to uncover a diabolical killer with a heinous plot, before this malicious murderer strikes again.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: February 1st 2004. 11-year-old Carlie Brucia disappears while walking home from a friend's house. Police discover security camera footage of her shocking abduction and the inquiry becomes a manhunt.

programme.title: The Deadly Hoax
programme.desc: A video-game player finds a nefarious new way to achieve internet fame.

programme.title: The Lies that Bind
programme.desc: Three months after high school sweethearts, Lisa and Jimmy Moore, end their marriage, Lisa disappears. Fearing the worst, her family file a missing person report, but the police have no leads, no witnesses, but they do know that someone is lying.
